title: Error instead audio message and rest of audio messages doesn't play after that
body: # Bug Report ## Problem There is an audio message in chat which error with `java.io.IOException: Prepare Async failed: status=0x800000` when tap play button. Other audio messages in same chat have no response when I hit Play button after that error appears. #### Expected behavior No errors when playing audiomessages #### Actual behavior ### Reproduction - Open Status and create new account - Join `status-chinese` public chat - Scroll to the audio message in the above screenshot - Tap play upon this audiomessage ### Additional Information - Status version: develop/release 1.13 - Operating System: Android and iOS #### Logs ``` 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 E AudioPlayerModule: java.io.IOException: Prepare Async failed.: status=0x80000000 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: dalvik.system.VMStack.getThreadStackTrace(Native Method) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: java.lang.Thread.getStackTrace(Thread.java:1736) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.reactnativecommunity.rctaudiotoolkit.AudioPlayerModule.errObj(AudioPlayerModule.java:121) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.reactnativecommunity.rctaudiotoolkit.AudioPlayerModule.errObj(AudioPlayerModule.java:142) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.reactnativecommunity.rctaudiotoolkit.AudioPlayerModule.prepare(AudioPlayerModule.java:328) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.facebook.react.bridge.JavaMethodWrapper.invoke(JavaMethodWrapper.java:372) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.facebook.react.bridge.JavaModuleWrapper.invoke(JavaModuleWrapper.java:151) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.facebook.react.bridge.queue.NativeRunnable.run(Native Method) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:938) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:99) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.facebook.react.bridge.queue.MessageQueueThreadHandler.dispatchMessage(MessageQueueThreadHandler.java:27) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:246) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: com.facebook.react.bridge.queue.MessageQueueThreadImpl$4.run(MessageQueueThreadImpl.java:226) 04-21 12:19:21.603 4780 6661 D AudioPlayerModule: java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:923) ```
Reopen if there will be the way to reproduce it
